title: Strategies for the sustainable use of forests

content.question: Sustainable use of forests in the United States would likely be encouraged by

choices.label: cutting small groups of medium- and large- sized trees in uneven-aged forests
clear-cutting old-growth forests to allow for secondary succession
allowing road building in wilderness areas so that older, clear-cut forests have time to regenerate
logging on steep slopes in designated wilderness areas
enforcing all provisions of the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act (RCRA)

content.answer: cutting small groups of medium- and large- sized trees in uneven-aged forests
